entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then snow. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
